entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
